subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Free agency and trades gave rosters an exceptional face-lift this off-season, even beyond the two All-Stars — LeBron James and Chris Bosh — who will join Dwyane Wade in Miami.
snippet: Free agency and trades gave rosters an exceptional face-lift this off-season, even beyond the two All-Stars — LeBron James and Chris Bosh — who will join Dwyane Wade in Miami.
